thread.title: Ed Roberts activist Google Doodle honors leader of the disability rights movement
thread.title_full: Ed Roberts activist Google Doodle honors leader of the disability rights movement

author: Amy Gesenhues
title: Ed Roberts activist Google Doodle honors leader of the disability rights movement
text:
As an early leader of disability rights, Roberts co-founded World Institute on Disability, the nonprofit organization focused on disability policy, research and consulting. The post Ed Roberts activist Google Doodle honors leader of the disability rights movement appeared first on Search Engine...

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
